data.chText: 抓紧；抓牢
data.enText: to take a firm hold of sb/sth

data.chText: 他热情地抓住我的手握了起来。
data.enText: He grasped my hand and shook it warmly.

data.chText: 凯紧紧抓住他的手腕。
data.enText: Kay grasped him by the wrist.

data.chText: 理解；领会；领悟；明白
data.enText: to understand sth completely

data.chText: 他们没有理解他的话的重要性。
data.enText: They failed to grasp the importance of his words.

data.chText: 她弄不明白这事该怎么做。
data.enText: She was unable to grasp how to do it.

data.chText: 他过了些时候才意识到自己已是个公众人物了。
data.enText: It took him some time to grasp that he was now a public figure.

data.chText: 急忙抓住，毫不犹豫地抓住（机会）
data.enText: to take an opportunity without hesitating and use it

data.chText: 我毫不犹豫地抓住了去国外工作的机会。
data.enText: I grasped the opportunity to work abroad.
grasp the nettle

data.chText: 果断地处理棘手问题
data.enText: to deal with a difficult situation firmly and without hesitating
clutch/grasp at straws

data.chText: （在危难中）抓救命稻草，不放过任何微小的机会
data.enText: to try all possible means to find a solution or some hope in a difficult or unpleasant situation, even though this seems very unlikely
grasp at sth

data.chText: 尽力抓住某物
data.enText: to try to take hold of sth in your hands

data.chText: 他从她身边冲过去时，她使劲地向他的上衣抓去。
data.enText: She grasped at his coat as he rushed past her.

data.chText: 抓住机会
data.enText: to try to take an opportunity

data.chText: 紧抓；紧握；控制
data.enText: a firm hold of sb/sth or control over sb/sth

data.chText: 我紧抓着他，可他还是从我手里溜掉了。
data.enText: I grabbed him, but he slipped from my grasp.

data.chText: 她感到手臂被紧紧地抓住了。
data.enText: She felt a firm grasp on her arm.

data.chText: 别让局面失去控制。
data.enText: Don't let the situation escape from your grasp.

data.chText: 理解（力）；领会
data.enText: a person's understanding of a subject or of difficult facts

data.chText: 他德语语法掌握得很好。
data.enText: He has a good grasp of German grammar.

data.chText: 这些复杂的公式是一般小学生不能理解的。
data.enText: These complex formulae are beyond the grasp of the average pupil.

data.chText: 能力所及
data.enText: the ability to get or achieve sth

data.chText: 她有把握获得成功。
data.enText: Success was within her grasp .

data.text: hold ♦ hold on ♦ cling ♦ clutch ♦ grip ♦ grasp ♦ clasp ♦ hang on

data.chText: 以上各词均含抓住、抱住、托住、握住之义。
data.enText: These words all mean to have sb/sth in your hands, arms, etc.
hold

data.chText: 指抓住、抱住、托住、握住：
data.enText: to have sb/sth in your hand, arms, etc.

data.chText: 她提着一只大箱子。
data.enText: She was holding a large box.

data.chText: 我把婴儿轻轻地抱在怀里。
data.enText: I held the baby gently in my arms.
hold on (to sb/sth)

data.chText: 指抓紧、不放开：
data.enText: to continue to hold sb/sth; to put your hand on sb/sth and not take your hand away

data.chText: 握紧，我让你松手时再松开。
data.enText: Hold on and don't let go until I say so.
cling

data.chText: 尤指用身体紧抱、紧握、抓紧：
data.enText: to hold on to sb/sth tightly, especially with your whole body

data.chText: 生还者紧紧抱住一块块漂浮在水面上的残骸。
data.enText: Survivors clung to pieces of floating debris.
clutch

data.chText: 尤指用手抓紧、紧握、抱紧、突然抓住：
data.enText: to hold sb/sth tightly, especially in your hand; to take hold of sth suddenly

data.chText: 她站在那里，手里仍然紧握着花束。
data.enText: She stood there, the flowers still clutched in her hand.

data.chText: 他感到自己滑了一下，便一把抓住一根树枝。
data.enText: He felt himself slipping and clutched at a branch.
grip

data.chText: 指用手紧握、紧抓：
data.enText: to hold on to sth very tightly with your hand

data.chText: 尽可能紧紧抓住绳子。
data.enText: Grip the rope as tightly as you can.
grasp

data.chText: 指抓紧、抓牢：
data.enText: to take hold of sth firmly

data.chText: 他热情地抓着我的手握了起来。
data.enText: He grasped my hand and shook it warmly.

data.chText: grasp的宾语通常为hand或wrist。
data.enText: The object of grasp is often sb's hand or wrist .
clasp

data.chText: 指紧握、攥紧、抱紧：
data.enText: ( formal ) to hold sb/sth tightly in your hand or in your arms

data.chText: 他们相互紧握着对方的手。
data.enText: They clasped hands (= held each other's hands) .

data.chText: 她把孩子紧紧地搂在怀里。
data.enText: She clasped the children in her arms.

data.chText: clasp的宾语通常为hand或另一个人。
data.enText: The object of clasp is often your hands , sb else's hand or another person.
hang on (to sth)

data.chText: 尤指为支撑自己或防止跌倒紧紧抓住某物：
data.enText: to hold on to sth very tightly, especially in order to support yourself or stop yourself from falling

data.chText: 抓紧，我们出发了！
data.enText: Hang on tight. We're off!
to hold/clutch/grip/clasp sth in your hand/hands
to hold/catch/clasp sb/sth in your arms
to grip/grasp sth with your hand/hands
to hold/clutch/grip/grasp/clasp/hang on to sth
to hold/cling/hang on
to hold/clutch/clasp sb/sth to you
to hold/hold on to/cling to/clutch/grip/grasp/clasp/hang on to sb/sth tight/tightly/firmly

data.text: understand ♦ see ♦ get ♦ follow ♦ grasp ♦ comprehend

data.chText: 以上各词均含懂得、理解、认识到之义。
data.enText: All these words mean to know or realize sth, for example why sth happens, how sth works or what sth means.
understand

data.chText: 指懂、理解、领会（词意、语言、话语等），了解、认识到、明白（事情如何或为何发生、如何起作用或为何重要等）：
data.enText: to know or realize the meaning of words, a language, what sb says, etc.; to know or realize how or why sth happens, how it works or why it is important

data.chText: 我不懂这些指令的意思。
data.enText: I don't understand the instructions.

data.chText: 医生对这种疾病还不太了解。
data.enText: Doctors still don't understand much about the disease.
see

data.chText: 指理解、明白、领会（正在发生的事、某人的话、某事如何起作用或重要性如何）：
data.enText: to understand what is happening, what sb is saying, how sth works or how important sth is

data.chText: “这样就打开了。”“哦，我明白了。”
data.enText: ‘It opens like this.’ ‘Oh, I see .’

data.chText: 噢，我明白你的意思了。
data.enText: Oh yes, I see what you mean .
get

data.chText: 指理解、明白（笑话、某人试图告知的事或描述的情况）：
data.enText: ( informal ) to understand a joke, what sb is trying to tell you, or a situation that they are trying to describe

data.chText: 她听不懂那个笑话。
data.enText: She didn't get the joke.

data.chText: 我搞不懂你的意思。
data.enText: I don't get you.
follow

data.chText: 指理解、明白（说明、故事、意思）：
data.enText: to understand an explanation, a story or the meaning of sth

data.chText: 对不起，我不太听懂你的话。
data.enText: Sorry─I don't quite follow.

data.chText: 故事情节几乎叫人不明所以。
data.enText: The plot is almost impossible to follow.
grasp

data.chText: 指理解、领会、领悟、明白（事实、想法或如何做某事）：
data.enText: to come to understand a fact, an idea or how to do sth

data.chText: 他们没有理解他的话的重要性。
data.enText: They failed to grasp the importance of his words.

data.chText: 用understand还是grasp？
第一次意识到某事的意义或重要性可用understand或grasp：
data.enText: You can use understand or grasp for the action of realizing the meaning or importance of sth for the first time.

data.chText: 对孩子来说，这是一个很难理解的概念。
data.enText: It's a difficult concept for children to understand/grasp.

data.chText: 只有understand可用于理解语言、词汇或文章等：
data.enText: Only understand can be used to talk about languages, words or writing.
I don't grasp French/the instructions.
understand or grasp?
comprehend

data.chText: （常用于否定句中）用于理解、领悟、明白（事实、想法或原因）：
data.enText: (often used in negative statements) ( formal ) to understand a fact, idea or reason

data.chText: 无穷的概念几乎是人类的大脑无法理解的。
data.enText: The concept of infinity is almost impossible for the human mind to comprehend.
to understand/see/get/follow/grasp/comprehend what/why/how…
to understand/see/grasp/comprehend that…
to be easy/difficult/hard to understand/see/follow/grasp/comprehend
to fully/completely understand/see/grasp/comprehend sth
to understand/see/get/grasp the point/idea (of sth)

ex.chText: 小偷抢了她的钱包逃跑了。
ex.enText: The thief snatched her purse and ran away.

ex.chText: 老鹰抓住一只鸽子飞走了。
ex.enText: The hawk snatched a pigeon and flew away.

ex.chText: 她走过去，好像要把信从他那里夺过来。
ex.enText: She walked over as if to snatch the letter from him.

synonyms.bx: 指突然地抢、夺、抓，强调动作迅速或具有暴力性质。

ex.chText: 那孩子紧紧抓住她的胳膊不放。
ex.enText: The child clutched her by the arm.

ex.chText: 他跳起来试图抓住那树枝，但没有成功。
ex.enText: He jumped up to clutch at the branch, but missed.

ex.chText: 抓救命稻草是无济于事的。
ex.enText: It is useless to clutch at straws.

synonyms.bx: 指因不想失去而紧紧地抓住某物，或因害怕、疼痛、危险等而突然抓住某人或某物。

ex.chText: 小偷猛地一把夺过她的钱包逃跑了。
ex.enText: The thief suddenly grabbed/snatched the purse from her and escaped.
Don't grab/snatch, there's plenty for everyone.
Quick, grab hold of that rope.

synonyms.bx: 指突然抓住某人或某物，强调动作粗野，作此义解时常可与snatch 换用；有时也指紧紧抓住某人或某物。

ex.chText: 抓住我的手，我把你拉过墙来。
ex.enText: Grasp my hand and I'll pull you over the wall.

synonyms.bx: 指紧紧地、牢牢地抓住某物。

ex.chText: 那个可怜的孩子紧紧地抓着母亲的手。
ex.enText: The poor child gripped his mother's hand.

ex.chText: 她使劲抓住栏杆，尽量不往下看。
ex.enText: She gripped the rail and tried not to look down.

synonyms.bx: 指用尽全力死死抓住某物，与 grasp 同义，但语气更强。

ex.chText: 他从书架上取了一本书。
ex.enText: He took a book from the shelf.
Someone took my cup by mistake.

ex.chText: 营房被攻占之后遭到了毁坏。
ex.enText: The camp was taken and destroyed.

synonyms.bx: 最普通用词，指用手拿、取、抓或控制某物，不带任何感情色彩。

data.enText: grasp the nettle

data.chText: 果断地处理棘手问题
data.enText: to deal with a difficult situation firmly and without hesitating
clutch/grasp at straws

data.chText: （在危难中）抓救命稻草，不放过任何微小的机会
data.enText: to try all possible means to find a solution or some hope in a difficult or unpleasant situation, even though this seems very unlikely
grasp at sth

data.chText: 尽力抓住某物
data.enText: to try to take hold of sth in your hands

data.chText: 他从她身边冲过去时，她使劲地向他的上衣抓去。
data.enText: She grasped at his coat as he rushed past her.

data.chText: 抓住机会
data.enText: to try to take an opportunity

example: he released his clasp on my arm
he has a strong grip for an old man
she kept a firm hold on the railing
a good grip on French history
they kept a firm grip on the two top priorities
he was in the grip of a powerful emotion
a terrible power had her in its grasp

tr: understanding of the nature or meaning or quality or magnitude of something
example: he has a good grasp of accounting practices
Do you comprehend the meaning of this letter?

value.def: If you grasp something, you take it in your hand and hold it very firmly.

example.ex: She was trying to grasp at something.
example.tran: 她正试图抓住什么东西。

value.def: A grasp is a very firm hold or grip.

example.ex: His hand was taken in a warm, firm grasp.
example.tran: 他的手被热情地紧紧握住了。

value.def: If you say that something is in someone's grasp, you disapprove of the fact that they possess or control it. If something slips from your grasp, you lose it or lose control of it.

example.ex: The people in your grasp are not guests, they are hostages...
example.tran: 你所控制的这些人不是客人，而是人质。

example.ex: She allowed victory to slip from her grasp.
example.tran: 她让胜利从手中溜走了。

example.ex: ...the task of liberating a number  of states from the grasp of tyrants.
example.tran: 将多个国家从暴君手中解放出来的任务

value.def: If you grasp something that is complicated or difficult to understand, you understand it.

example.ex: The Government has not yet grasped the seriousness of the crisis...
example.tran: 政府当局还没有意识到这场危机的严重性。

example.ex: He instantly grasped that Stephen was talking about his wife.
example.tran: 他马上就明白斯蒂芬在说他的妻子。

value.def: A grasp of something is an understanding of it.

example.ex: They have a good grasp of foreign languages.

value.def: If you say that something is within someone's grasp, you mean that it is very likely that they will achieve it.

example.ex: Peace is now within our grasp.

trans: 迎难而上;知难而进;大胆抓棘手问题
